edu.wmich.cs1120.TThompson.LA3

Interface ILibrary


  • public interface ILibrary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkOut()
      Sets the boolean value checkedOut to true, and initializes the dateChecked out attribute (a GregorianCalendar object).
      java.lang.String getCallNumber()
      Returns the call number of this object.
      java.util.GregorianCalendar getDateCheckedOut()
      Returns the date this item was checked out.
      java.util.GregorianCalendar getDateDue()
      Returns the date this item is due to be returned.
      boolean isCheckedOut()
      Returns true or false depending on if this item has been checked out.
      void setDateDue(java.util.GregorianCalendar dateDue)
      Sets the dateDue to the parameter received.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Generates a string with the details of the library item whose call number has been input by the user (see example output) and returns that string.

    • Method Detail

      • checkOut

        void checkOut()
        Sets the boolean value checkedOut to true, and initializes the dateChecked out attribute (a GregorianCalendar object).

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Generates a string with the details of the library item whose call number has been input by the user (see example output) and returns that string. If the user wants to check out the library item, the string to be returned also includes information that the item has been checked out, the date it was checked out, and the due date for the item.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string of information

      • getCallNumber

        java.lang.String getCallNumber()
        Returns the call number of this object.
        Returns:
        the callNumber

      • isCheckedOut

        boolean isCheckedOut()
        Returns true or false depending on if this item has been checked out.
        Returns:
        the boolean value for isCheckedOut

      • getDateCheckedOut

        java.util.GregorianCalendar getDateCheckedOut()
        Returns the date this item was checked out.
        Returns:
        the dateCheckedOut

      • getDateDue

        java.util.GregorianCalendar getDateDue()
        Returns the date this item is due to be returned.
        Returns:
        the dateDue

        Parameters:
